title: Omar DANTE
sahitya:
Omar DANTE SEkspear milTon oppillAda kavigaL nAm Odum vara kavigaL


anupallavi

  bhUmiyuLLa maTTum ivar pugazh poliyum mEnmElum


caraNam    Azhak-karuttum navarasa nayamum azhagukk-azhagAm aNiyum vAzhga naDaiyum
vanna mozhiyum manadukk-inburu marundAm vAzhvu magizhvuru virundAm
